(Received 18th.).3584. 17th March. Malleson wired 12th March : " After prolonged enquiries, it may be definitely taken that Kuropatkin, so frequently reported as being in Turkestan, is not there, but in Moscow. Apparently Novitsky has been mistaken for Kuropatkin. Enquiries about Brusiloff proceeding,"I
